type: Legendary Creature – Human Cleric Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Journey Begins[/i] – When Celica, Alm's Foil enters, search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
[i]Light the Way[/i] – {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}. Creature spells you cast this turn can't be countered.
[i]Hope's Promise[/i] – Whenever another creature you control attacks, you gain 1 life.
